Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.33102950]Virus:SARS-CoV-2:inhibition of replication In VeroE6 cells(IC50=3.16 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide inhibits the spike protein interaction with α5β1 integrin and the interaction between α5β1 integrin and ACE2.

Literature.Title: The Integrin Binding Peptide, ATN-161, as a Novel Therapy for SARS-CoV-2 Infection.
Literature.Author: Beddingfield BJ, Iwanaga N, Chapagain PP, Zheng W, Roy CJ, Hu TY, Kolls JK, Bix GJ.
